verses.verse: מִזְמ֡וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm שִׁ֤ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Shi-ru O sing לַֽיהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> shir song חָ֭דָשׁ <S%H2319><s%> Cha-dosh a new כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נִפְלָא֣וֹת <S%H6381><s%> nif-la-'ot marvellous things עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; for he hath done הוֹשִֽׁיעָה־ <S%H3467><s%> ho-shi-'ah- hath gotten him the victory לּ֥וֹ lo יְ֝מִינ֗וֹ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No, his right hand וּזְר֥וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> u-ze-Ro-a' arm קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho. and his holy

הוֹדִ֣יעַ <S%H3045><s%> ho-Di-a' hath made known יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יְשׁוּעָת֑וֹ <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-To; his salvation לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei in the sight הַ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen גִּלָּ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> gil-Lah hath he openly shewed צִדְקָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6666><s%> tzid-ka-To. his righteousness

זָ֘כַ֤ר <S%H2142><s%> za-Char He hath remembered חַסְדּ֨וֹ׀ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do his mercy וֶֽאֱֽמוּנָתוֹ֮ <S%H530><s%> ve-'e-mu-na-To and his truth לְבֵ֪ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit toward the house יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> yis-Ra-'El of Israel רָא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U have seen כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol All אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> 'af-sei- all the ends אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; of the earth אֵ֝֗ת <S%H853><s%> 'Et, יְשׁוּעַ֥ת <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'At the salvation אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. of our God

הָרִ֣יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> ha-Ri-'u Make a joyful noise לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; all the earth פִּצְח֖וּ <S%H6476><s%> pitz-Chu make a loud noise וְרַנְּנ֣וּ <S%H7442><s%> ve-ran-ne-Nu and rejoice וְזַמֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H2167><s%> ve-zam-Me-ru. and sing

זַמְּר֣וּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Ru Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD בְּכִנּ֑וֹר <S%H3658><s%> be-chin-Nor; with the harp בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> be-chin-Nor, with the harp וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ve-Kol and the voice זִמְרָֽה׃ <S%H2172><s%> zim-Rah. of a psalm

בַּ֭חֲצֹ֣צְרוֹת <S%H2689><s%> ba-cha-Tzo-tze-rot With trumpets וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ve-Kol and sound שׁוֹפָ֑ר <S%H7782><s%> sho-Far; of cornet הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> ha-Ri-'u, make a joyful noise לִפְנֵ֤י׀ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הַמֶּ֬לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the King יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

יִרְעַ֣ם <S%H7481><s%> yir-'Am roar הַ֭יָּם <S%H3220><s%> Hai-yom Let the sea וּמְלֹא֑וֹ <S%H4393><s%> u-me-lo-'O; and the fulness תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel, thereof the world וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> ve-Yo-she-vei and they that dwell בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

נְהָר֥וֹת <S%H5104><s%> ne-ha-Rot Let the floods יִמְחֲאוּ־ <S%H4222><s%> yim-cha-'u- clap כָ֑ף <S%H3709><s%> Chaf; [their] hands יַ֝֗חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad, together הָרִ֥ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim let the hills יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7442><s%> ye-ran-Ne-nu. be joyful

לִֽפְֽנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei- Before יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָא֮ <S%H935><s%> va for he cometh לִשְׁפֹּ֪ט <S%H8199><s%> lish-Pot to judge הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the earth יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <S%H8199><s%> yish-pot- shall he judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> be-Tze-dek; with righteousness וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am-Mim, and the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> be-mei-sha-Rim. with equity
